# EnergyTradeTables

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `R` package `EnergyTradeTables` provides functions to 
develop and analyze international energy trade tables.


## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MatthewHeun/EnergyTradeTables")
```
